title: CVS Health to hire 25,000 across the U.S. during one-day virtual career event
description: WCVS Health (NYSE: CVS) today announced that it is recruiting qualified candidates to fill 25,000 clinical and retail jobs during a one-day national career event on Friday, September 24.

title: WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE SCHEDULES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2021 EARNINGS ANNOUNCEMENT
description: Walgreens Boots Alliance Schedules Fourth Quarter and Fiscal 2021 Earnings Announcement and Virtual Investor Conference for October 14, 2021

title: Health Mart Pharmacies Launch COVID-19 Test Collection Sites
description: Health Mart® pharmacies will offer free COVID-19 test collection beginning this week in select pharmacies across the U.S.

title: UnitedHealth Group Board Authorizes Payment of Quarterly Dividend
description: The UnitedHealth Group (NYSE: UNH) board of directors has authorized payment of a cash dividend of $1.45 per share, to be paid on December 14, 2021, to all shareholders of record of UnitedHealth Group common stock as of the close of business on December 6, 2021.

title: McKesson’s New HQ Home is Irving
description: McKesson Corporation has made it official, they are a Texas-based company as of April 1. Hundreds of employees joined Brian Tyler, the company’s new CEO on April 8 to celebrate the milestone at their new Las Colinas corporate headquarters.

title: AmerisourceBergen Announces Date and Time for Fourth Quarter Fiscal 2021 Earnings Release
description: AmerisourceBergen Corporation (NYSE: ABC) today announced that it plans to release its results for the Fourth Quarter of Fiscal 2021 on Thursday, November 4, 2021, prior to the opening of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The Company will host a conference call to discuss the results at 8:30 a.m. ET on November 4, 2021.

title: Advocating for healthcare providers
description: Over the last nearly two years the COVID-19 pandemic has created historic challenges for healthcare providers and patients. The entire healthcare system has faced unprecedented stress as providers work tirelessly to care for their patients improve access to care increase equitable outcomes and seek new administrative efficiencies.

title: Cigna Corporation Announces Appearance at the Wolfe Research Virtual Healthcare Conference
description: Global health service company Cigna Corporation  announced today that Brian Evanko, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will present at the Wolfe Research Virtual Healthcare Conference on November 18, 2021 through a virtual webcast.

title: What You Need to Know About Johnson & Johnson's 2021 Third-Quarter Earnings
description: Global health service company Cigna Corporation (NYSE:CI) announced today that Brian Evanko, executive vice president and chief financial officer, will present at the Wolfe Research Virtual Healthcare Conference on November 18, 2021 through a virtual webcast.

title: Anthem to Hold Conference Call and Webcast to Discuss Third Quarter Results on October 20, 2021
description: Anthem, Inc. (NYSE: ANTM) will release third quarter 2021 financial results on October 20, 2021, at 6:00 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time (“EDT”). Management will review these results and its outlook during a conference call at 8:30 a.m. EDT that same morning. The conference call should be accessed at least 15 minutes prior to its start with the following numbers:
